     1	package logger
     2	
     3	import (
     4		"fmt"
     5	)
     6	
     7	func Debug(args ...interface{}) {
     8		GetDefaultLogger().Debug(args...)
     9	}
    10	
    11	func Debugf(format string, args ...interface{}) {
    12		GetDefaultLogger().Debugf(format, args...)
    13	}
    14	
    15	func Info(args ...interface{}) {
    16		GetDefaultLogger().Info(args...)
    17	}
    18	
    19	func Infof(format string, args ...interface{}) {
    20		GetDefaultLogger().Infof(format, args...)
    21	}
    22	
    23	func Warn(args ...interface{}) {
    24		GetDefaultLogger().Warn(args...)
    25	}
    26	
    27	func Warnf(format string, args ...interface{}) {
    28		GetDefaultLogger().Warnf(format, args...)
    29	}
    30	
    31	func Error(args ...interface{}) {
    32		GetDefaultLogger().Error(args...)
    33	}
    34	
    35	func Errorf(format string, args ...interface{}) {
    36		GetDefaultLogger().Errorf(format, args...)
    37	}
    38	
    39	func SetLogLevel(level Level) {
    40		GetDefaultLogger().SetLogLevel(level)
    41	}
    42	
    43	func GetDefaultLogger() Logger {
    44		defLogger := GetLogger("engine")
    45		if defLogger == nil {
    46			errorMsg := fmt.Sprintf("Engine: Error Getting engine Logger null")
    47			panic(errorMsg)
    48		}
    49		return defLogger
    50	}
